member.name: T:intelloTech.ProScript.Events
member.summary: Contains events which agents can raise and you can subscribe to.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.MsgBox
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests a message box to be shown.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.ChangeSource
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current page's source to be changed.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.NavigateToURL
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current browser to navigate to a different URL.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.NewTab
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests a new tab to be opened.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.NewWindow
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests a new window to be opened.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.ChangeHomepage
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current homepage to be changed.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.ChangeNewTabPage
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current new tab page to be changed.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.BookmarkPage
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests a specific page to be bookmarked.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.DeleteBookmark
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests a specific bookmark to be deleted.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.ViewSource
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser to view the source a specific page.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.InitiateDownload
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests a download to be initiated.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.CancelDownload
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests a download to be cancelled.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.ChangeTab
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current tab to be changed.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.GoBack
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current browser to go back one page.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.GoForward
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current browser to go forward one page.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.CloseTab
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current tab to be closed.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.CloseAllTabsButCurrent
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests all tabs but the current to be closed.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.CloseWindow
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current window to be closed.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.CloseAllWindowsButCurrent
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests all windows but the current to be closed.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.ClearHistory
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser history to be cleaned.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.ClearCache
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser cache to be cleaned.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.ClearCookies
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests all cookies to be deleted.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.ExitApplication
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser to close.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.RestartApplication
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser to restart.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.SaveSession
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the current session to be saved.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.RestorePreviousSession
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the previous session to be restored.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.CheckForUpdates
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser to check for updates.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.OpenOptions
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser to open its options dialog.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.OpenHistory
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser to open its history manager.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.OpenBookmarks
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser to open its bookmark manager.

member.name: E:intelloTech.ProScript.Events.OpenDownloads
member.summary: The event which is raised when an agent requests the browser to open its download manager.

member.summary: Provides basic EventArgs for events which don't need any information to be passed except the sender agent.

member.name: T:intelloTech.ProScript.AgentManagement
member.summary: Contains methods and variables to manage agents and the global collection of agents.

member.name: M:intelloTech.ProScript.AgentManagement.AddAgentsInFolder(System.String,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{intelloTech.ProScript.Agent}@)
member.summary: Adds all agents in the specified folder to the specified collection. This will not affect the global collection of agents (unless the collection specified is the global collection of agents).
member.param: The folder in which the agents are located
The collection the agents will be added to.

member.name: M:intelloTech.ProScript.AgentManagement.AddAgentsInFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Adds all agents in the specified folder to the global collection of agents.
member.param: The folder in which the agents are located

member.name: M:intelloTech.ProScript.AgentManagement.ListAgentsInFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a collection of all agents found in the specified folder.
member.param: The folder in which the agents are located

member.name: P:intelloTech.ProScript.AgentManagement.GlobalAgents
member.summary: The global collection of agents.
